EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TechTalks_Q314.Invite from Chris Boone
EmailTemplate.subject: Invite to Tech Talks at Pivotal Labs HQ in San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We're hosting a new series of Tech Talks at Pivotal Labs headquarters in San Francisco <http://pivotallabs.com/tech-talks-how-to-scale-software-team/>, and we'd love if you can join the launch on Thursday, July 31 at 6 p.m. PDT.
Davis Frank, Associate Director at Pivotal Labs, will share his insights on how to successfully scale a software team. This Tech Talk will be followed by a breakout session and networking, all of which I'm sure you will find of interest and value.
If you canâ€™t make it, please feel free to recommend someone else who could attend in your place. Additional details and link to register is below.
RSVP HERE <http://pivotallabs.com/tech-talks-how-to-scale-software-team>
Topic: Grow, Don't Break: How to Scale a Software Team Date: Thursday, July 31, 2014 Time: 6 p.m. - 8 p.m. PDT Location: Pivotal Labs, 875 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA
Looking forward to seeing you there {{lead.First Name:default=}}.
Regards, Chris
Chris Boone Associate Director Pivotal Labs
